eip155:1/erc20:0xed4064f376cb8d68f770fb1: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xd533a949740bb3306d119cc777fa900ba034cd52) and [ETH](/assets/eip155:1/slip44:60). To acquire Curve CRV-ETH, deposit [CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xd533a949740bb3306d119cc777fa900ba034cd52) and/or [ETH](/assets/eip155:1/slip44:60) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/crveth/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.
eip155:1/erc20:0x5a6a4d54456819380173272: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [MIM](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3) and [3CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6c3f90f043a72fa612cbac8115ee7e52bde6e490). [3CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6c3f90f043a72fa612cbac8115ee7e52bde6e490) is another Curve LP token that consists of [DAI](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f), [USDT](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7), and [USDC](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48). To acquire crvMIM, deposit [MIM](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3), [DAI](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f), [USDT](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7), and/or [USDC](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/mim/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss but because all of the assets in the pool are pegged to $1, impermanent loss is unlikely and would only result if one of the assets in the pool lost its peg.
eip155:1/erc20:0x55a8a39bc9694714e2874c1: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [MIM](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3) and [UST](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa47c8bf37f92abed4a126bda807a7b7498661acd). TerraUSD ([UST](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa47c8bf37f92abed4a126bda807a7b7498661acd)) is the decentralized and algorithmic stable coin of the Terra blockchain. To acquire Curve MIM-UST, deposit [MIM](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3) and [UST](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa47c8bf37f92abed4a126bda807a7b7498661acd) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/factory/48/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss but because all of the assets in the pool are pegged to $1, impermanent loss is unlikely and would only result if one of the assets in the pool lost its peg.
